mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_id, e.name, e.position, e.task, e.telephone, w.work_id AS w_work_id, w.code AS w_code, w.name AS w_name FROM employee e INNER JOIN work w ON e.work_id = w.work_id ORDER BY e.employee_id

SELECT e.employee_id, e.name, e.position, e.task, e.telephone, w.work_id AS w_work_id, w.code AS w_code, w.name AS w_name FROM employee e INNER JOIN work w ON e.work_id = w.work_id WHERE e.employee_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (name, position, task, telephone, work_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{position}, #{task}, #{telephone}, #{work.id})
